trailingComments.value:
*
 * A blur pass that produces a wide blur by downsampling and upsampling the input over multiple MIP levels.
 *
 * Based on an article by Fabrice Piquet:
 * https://www.froyok.fr/blog/2021-12-ue4-custom-bloom/

leadingComments.value:
*
	 * Constructs a new mipmap blur pass.
	 *
	 * @param {Object} [options] - The options.

trailingComments.value:
*
	 * A texture that contains the blurred result.
	 *
	 * @type {Texture}

leadingComments.value:
*
	 * A texture that contains the blurred result.
	 *
	 * @type {Texture}

trailingComments.value:
*
	 * Renders the blur.
	 *
	 * @param {WebGLRenderer} renderer - The renderer.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} inputBuffer - A frame buffer that contains the result of the previous pass.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} outputBuffer - A frame buffer that serves as the output render target unless this pass renders to screen.
	 * @param {Number} [deltaTime] - The time between the last frame and the current one in seconds.
	 * @param {Boolean} [stencilTest] - Indicates whether a stencil mask is active.
Downsample the input to the highest MIP level (smallest mipmap).

leadingComments.value: Downsample the input to the highest MIP level (smallest mipmap).

trailingComments.value: Upsample the result back to the lowest MIP level (largest mipmap, half resolution).

leadingComments.value: Upsample the result back to the lowest MIP level (largest mipmap, half resolution).

trailingComments.value: A + B = C, then D + C = F, etc.

leadingComments.value: A + B = C, then D + C = F, etc.

	 * @param {Number} [deltaTime] - The time between the last frame and the current one in seconds.
	 * @param {Boolean} [stencilTest] - Indicates whether a stencil mask is active.

leadingComments.value:
*
	 * Deletes internal render targets and textures.

*
 * A blur pass that produces a wide blur by downsampling and upsampling the input over multiple MIP levels.
 *
 * Based on an article by Fabrice Piquet:
 * https://www.froyok.fr/blog/2021-12-ue4-custom-bloom/

*
 * A blur pass that produces a wide blur by downsampling and upsampling the input over multiple MIP levels.
 *
 * Based on an article by Fabrice Piquet:
 * https://www.froyok.fr/blog/2021-12-ue4-custom-bloom/

comments.value:
*
 * A blur pass that produces a wide blur by downsampling and upsampling the input over multiple MIP levels.
 *
 * Based on an article by Fabrice Piquet:
 * https://www.froyok.fr/blog/2021-12-ue4-custom-bloom/

*
	 * Constructs a new mipmap blur pass.
	 *
	 * @param {Object} [options] - The options.

*
	 * A texture that contains the blurred result.
	 *
	 * @type {Texture}

*
	 * Renders the blur.
	 *
	 * @param {WebGLRenderer} renderer - The renderer.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} inputBuffer - A frame buffer that contains the result of the previous pass.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} outputBuffer - A frame buffer that serves as the output render target unless this pass renders to screen.
	 * @param {Number} [deltaTime] - The time between the last frame and the current one in seconds.
	 * @param {Boolean} [stencilTest] - Indicates whether a stencil mask is active.
Downsample the input to the highest MIP level (smallest mipmap).
Upsample the result back to the lowest MIP level (largest mipmap, half resolution).
A + B = C, then D + C = F, etc.

*
	 * Updates the size of this pass.
	 *
	 * @param {Number} width - The width.
	 * @param {Number} height - The height.

*
	 * Performs initialization tasks.
	 *
	 * @param {WebGLRenderer} renderer - The renderer.
	 * @param {Boolean} alpha - Whether the renderer uses the alpha channel or not.
	 * @param {Number} frameBufferType - The type of the main frame buffers.

*
	 * Deletes internal render targets and textures.

tokens.value:
*
 * A blur pass that produces a wide blur by downsampling and upsampling the input over multiple MIP levels.
 *
 * Based on an article by Fabrice Piquet:
 * https://www.froyok.fr/blog/2021-12-ue4-custom-bloom/

*
	 * Constructs a new mipmap blur pass.
	 *
	 * @param {Object} [options] - The options.

*
	 * A texture that contains the blurred result.
	 *
	 * @type {Texture}

*
	 * Renders the blur.
	 *
	 * @param {WebGLRenderer} renderer - The renderer.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} inputBuffer - A frame buffer that contains the result of the previous pass.
	 * @param {WebGLRenderTarget} outputBuffer - A frame buffer that serves as the output render target unless this pass renders to screen.
	 * @param {Number} [deltaTime] - The time between the last frame and the current one in seconds.
	 * @param {Boolean} [stencilTest] - Indicates whether a stencil mask is active.
Downsample the input to the highest MIP level (smallest mipmap).
Upsample the result back to the lowest MIP level (largest mipmap, half resolution).
A + B = C, then D + C = F, etc.

*
	 * Updates the size of this pass.
	 *
	 * @param {Number} width - The width.
	 * @param {Number} height - The height.

*
	 * Performs initialization tasks.
	 *
	 * @param {WebGLRenderer} renderer - The renderer.
	 * @param {Boolean} alpha - Whether the renderer uses the alpha channel or not.
	 * @param {Number} frameBufferType - The type of the main frame buffers.

*
	 * Deletes internal render targets and textures.
